title.value: Сравнительное изучение иммуногенной активности вакцины живой сухой против реовирусного теносиновита птиц с применением различных растворителей
Comparative study on immunogenic activity of dry live vaccine against avian reovirus tenosynovitis with the use of various solvents

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Radyush, I.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was studied the influence of a immunostimulatory complex as a dissolution medium on the immunogenic properties of a dried vaccine against poultry rheoviral tenosynovitis. Immunogenic activity of living reoviral culture dried vaccine against tenosynovitis in chickens with using of different solvents (ISCOM, PBS, SS) was studied. It was shown that combination of living reoviral culture vaccine against tenosynovitis with ISCOM was more immunogenic active in SPF chicken. On the 21 days of buster immunization only in this group of chickens the specific antibodies titers were statistically hire when comparison with the other two groups of experimental chickens (PBS, SS).
